title: Put Your Number 2's in the Air if You Did It On Em
itunes:title: Put Your Number 2's in the Air if You Did It On Em
description:
Monday 8/20 - Today on the show after Dwyane Wade clapped back at NBA player Jimmy Butler for commenting on his wife Gabriel Union's picture, we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought about their friends commenting on their partners picture. Moreover, we had Ex-Crips Leader, who now turned activist Big U, stop by where he spoke about the black community, Nipsey Hussle, YG Union and more. Also, after Nicki Minaj twitter rant this weekend over album sales, Charlamagne gave her the biggest hee haw for "Donkey of the Day" for being a sore winner. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
